country.title: Country
country.description: Enter the country to target for scraping employees. Default is United States.

region.title: State or Region
region.description: Optional. Enter a specific state or region within the selected country.

companySizes.title: Company Size Ranges (comma-separated)
companySizes.description: Enter one or more company size ranges, separated by commas. Example: 11-50,51-200

onlyValidEmails.title: Only include verified emails (no catch-all)
onlyValidEmails.description: Enable this to exclude catch-all or unverified emails.
